issue.title: Show the mail and phone of the client in order recap
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We propose to add the mail and phone of the client in order views for provider and validator.
We need this for suppliers: when they have questions or problems, the need to be able to contact the client.

If the field is not set in contact address (phone), the line will not be shown.

!show_mail_and_phone_in_recap.png!


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Dear TC members, can we imagine to talk about it here, and eventually vote on it before the next TC meeting ?
Thanks to all !

(Of course, +1 for me ^^ )

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC validated this enhancement.
